snippet.title: Syberia: The World Before l Accolades Trailer l Microids
snippet.description:
Embark on a journey across continents and through time, as you piece together the puzzle of a life. Buy now: https://www.microids.com/game-syberia-the-world-before/

Vaghen, 1937: Dana Roze is a 17-year-old girl, who is beginning a brilliant career as a pianist. However, shadows begin to appear over her future as the fascist threat of the Brown Shadow hangs over Europe, at the dawn of the Second World War. 

Taiga, 2004: Kate Walker survives as best she can in the salt mine where she has been imprisoned, when a tragic event propels her into a new adventure in search of her identity.

Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1410640/Syberia_The_World_Before/
GOG : https://www.gog.com/game/syberia_the_world_before
Epic Games : https://www.epicgames.com/store/fr/p/syberia-the-world-before

#syberia #syberiatheworldbefore #pointandclick #adventuregame #videogame #videogames #game #games #gaming #microids

Website : https://www.microids.com/
Twitter : https://twitter.com/Microids_off
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/microids/
Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/microids_official/
